oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clarksville-Montgomery County Consolidated Government Charter Commission: Public Safety and Courts Subcommittee Meeting Minutes, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Public Safety and Courts Subcommittee held six meetings between February and June 1980. The subcommittee discussed how the court system and law enforcement would operate under consolidation. Notably, the subcommittee decided that the Fire Department would remain relatively unchanged.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Municipal courts--Tennessee; Meetings
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
